We've been hanging around this yard as much as we can lately. We know those triple digit temps will be here before we know it and we are getting our time in! On Monday we are starting the work on our back patio area. So much progress over here lately and as exciting as it is, we are just looking forward to getting "back to normal". Also after having no idea what to do with this little corner by our entryway, we finally decided to add our guitars along side the record player. It's been so nice having them out in the main room of our house.
